strategy: Adopt a dynamic threshold-based strategy where the row player monitors the column player's action sequence over the last 3 rounds and calculates a behavioral volatility index. If the column player's actions exhibit high volatility (i.e., alternating between Coordination and Conflict), the row player switches to a 70% probability of choosing Conflict. Otherwise, they select Coordination with 70% probability. This strategy leverages temporal consistency detection to anticipate instability and adjust accordingly.
